title: new game mode!
body:
alright i was in aram...and decided to just sell my items and buy zephers .. and ran straight to the end of the enemies base ..so i was thinking ..a game mode called bullrush ..you choose 2 champions ..one for defense and one for when your in .. like you can choose any 2 champions ..you start at level 6 and 1400 gold ..goal is to race too the other end of the base ..with out getting killed ... the runners ...have 50 health each player, the defenders have 1000 just so people dont think they can fight them ..once you get caught or killed .. next turn your on the defenders side, each time a champion passes threw the goals ..the leader ..chooses who they want on there team....then they become the chasers ..

feel free to add any ideas to this game mode ..would love to see it happen

replies.body:
A good idea, but would have to be modified heavily to actually work.

EDIT: Udyr and every other high mobility champion would be picked or banned every game. So yeah, HEAVY modification would be required.
